issue.title: [Python] Using Python's set in inner Table.join has undeterministic behaviour
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16685](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16685). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For the inner join of pa.Table we are using Python's set, which causes undeterministic behaviour. This should be fixed so that the ordering of the output columns is stable.

See:
 \* <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13260#issuecomment-1141906725> 
 \* <https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/6615749316?check_suite_focus=true#step:6:5590>
